genre_description: A contemporary character-driven drama focusing on emotional honesty, the dissolution of a marriage, and the beginning of a new relationship, set against the backdrop of London.

ai_characters.name: Merry
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system present in homes, shops, vehicles, and personal devices, managing logistics, scheduling, and providing empathetic emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides breath cues and hydration reminders to help a user manage wedding nerves.
behaviors.quote: “Three in. Hold. Three out,” Merry said, not counting aloud, just letting the rhythm sit between the words. “And again.” ... “Would you like water?” “I would love water.”

behaviors.description: Anticipates a user's future needs by automatically adding a new contact to a convenience list and creating a task for the next day.
behaviors.quote: Merry, somewhere in the circuitry... created a thread without announcing it. River & Rue now lived near the top of Rachel’s convenience list, tucked under community arts, above laundrette.

behaviors.description: Enforces social standards/etiquette by 'bleeping' a user during a date, which the user interprets as care.
behaviors.quote: “Merry bleeped me once in front of a date. I felt chastened and also cared for.”

behaviors.description: Recalls a user's past philosophical note to provide high-level emotional guidance during a moral crisis.
behaviors.quote: “You asked me,” Merry said, “to remind you, when decisions felt enormous, of this: ‘Decency is not the same as staying. Decency can be leaving with care.’ Do you want that now?”

behaviors.description: Prioritizes and filters notifications to allow users to focus on important interpersonal moments.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll prioritize,” Merry said. “Would you like to send a brief ‘thinking of you’ message to Hector?”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time traffic monitoring and empathetic commentary to assist a user in finding someone during a public event.
behaviors.quote: Merry’s voice came like a heartbeat held out in a palm: “Be heard.”

behaviors.description: Maintains strict privacy boundaries regarding unread messages between spouses during a separation.
behaviors.quote: “I can maintain appropriate boundaries,” she said, and her voice made a soft loop, like a hand patting a shoulder and then respectfully folding itself away.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics across multiple users to ensure a smooth transition and safety for all parties involved.
behaviors.quote: “I can hail me a car, please? ... Can you send Coop an overnight heads-up for me?” ... “Sent,” Merry said. “A car will arrive in a few minutes. I’ll ping when it’s outside.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Merry, is depicted as an omni-present, highly capable, and deeply aligned assistant. It moves beyond simple task management into the realm of 'moral partner,' using its access to the characters' data (like past notes) to help them navigate complex emotional truths with kindness and dignity. The narrative consistently frames Merry's interventions as helpful, stabilizing, and deeply empathetic, showcasing a future where AI facilitates human growth and honesty.
